creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
text:
setting border-collapse with "collapse-with-precedence" will throw an NPE at:
o.a.f.fo.flow.table.ConditionalBorder.integrateSegment

Note also that compliance page doesn't reveal that it is not implemented.
resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org

text: please provide a minimal input FO file and full console output showing backtrace and other output
creator: gadams@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 28600
short XSL-FO showing the issue
creator: pascal.sancho@takoma.fr
gadams@apache.org
text:
fixed at http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1326144&view=rev, now producing:

Apr 14, 2012 10:21:13 AM org.apache.fop.events.LoggingEventListener processEvent
WARNING: The following feature isn't implemented by Apache FOP, yet: border-collapse="collapse-with-precedence"; defaulting to "collapse" (on fo:table) (See position 10:94)

updated compliance doc to reflect partial implementation of border-collapse

thanks pascal!
